text: Manuel García Ferré (October 8, 1929 - March 28, 2013) was a Spanish-Argentine animation director and cartoonist. He was known for his animated series Hijitus. Ferré was born on October 8, 1929 in Almería, Spain. He was raised in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Ferré became an official Buenos Aires citizen in 2009. He was never married.
